message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.SD 

The paper deals with neural machine translation and image captioning, which are both subfields of natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a novel learning mechanism using cooperative games, which falls under the subfield of reinforcement learning (RL) and multi-agent systems (MAS), making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Learning) likely sub-categories as well. Finally, the paper also discusses the problem of data scarcity, which is a common issue in machine learning (ML) and data mining (DM), making cs.SD (Sound) a possible sub-category.
